subject: Books and Literature
Football
lead_paragraph: Eleven years after his final broadcast on “Monday Night Football,” Frank Gifford, 78, is recast as the leading man of 1958 N.F.L. championship game nostalgia.
snippet: Eleven years after his final broadcast on “Monday Night Football,” Frank Gifford, 78, is recast as the leading man of 1958 N.F.L. championship game nostalgia.
